author: imario
msg: Add purgePersistence to inform the PersistenceManager that something went wrong.
Its assumed that the PersistenceManager will throw away its session (in case of hibernate)

author: imario
msg: RedirectTracker: a try to capture and restore - after a redirect - some request data, so that it makes no difference if one uses the <redirect /> navigation configuration.
